alert.note: Alert for Nassau; Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 23 at 1:14PM EST until December 23 at 2:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Suffolk County in southeastern New York... Southeastern Nassau County in southeastern New York... * Until 200 PM EST. * At 112 PM EST, showers with isolated thunderstorms producing damaging winds were located along a line extending from Plainview to 11 miles south of Robert Moses State Park, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Islip, Brentwood, Levittown, Freeport, Commack, Centereach, Shirley, Deer Park, Lindenhurst, Plainview, Medford, Garden City, Massapequa, Hauppauge and Ronkonkoma. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
